title: Reciprocal Teaching: Overview
body: This course provides an introduction and overview of Reciprocal Teaching and a brief review of research supporting it.

title: Reciprocal Teaching: Summarizing
body: This course is the beginning of comprehension strategy instruction and includes materials and directions for teaching students to summarize.

title: Reciprocal Teaching: Questioning
body: This course includes materials and directions for teaching students to generate questions.

title: Reciprocal Teaching: Predicting
body: This course includes materials and directions for teaching students to make predictions.

title: Reciprocal Teaching: Clarifying & Putting it All Together
body: This course includes materials and directions for teaching students to determine what needs to be clarified, how to ask for clarification, and how to combine all of the Reciprocal Teaching strategies.

title: Reciprocal Teaching: Making It Work for You
body: This course includes tips for common challenges, prompting strategies, and how to fit Reciprocal Teaching into your instructional sequence.
url: Reciprocal Teaching: Making It Work for You
